english.segment1: Verse 1: I say I will, but then I won't. Say I do, but then I don't. It happens every day, I hate the sinner, Love the sin. It's a sorry state I'm in. I've got to get away.
english.segment2: Every time I throw that stone. The fate I'm sealing is my own. Do you know how much I need..
english.segment3: Chorus: Forgiveness - forgiveness. I can't live without. Forgiveness - forgiveness. That's what love's about. Forgiveness.
english.segment4: Verse 2: I say forgive and then forget, But I ain't learned to do it yet. You'd think I'd know by now. I know how to hurt someone, Been on both sides of that gun, Pulled the trigger anyhow.
english.segment5: When I'm hurting someone else. I only hurt myself. I've got to let it go.
english.segment7: A thousand wrongs don't make a right. And nobody wins. When the bridges start burning. Can't you hear my cry?
